content:
I'm trying to slice with discriminator type:resolve()
When build with the ig publisher the profile builds.
But if I add an example to the build that includes an entry that uses the slicing I get the error

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0

If I slice with discriminator profile:resolve() there are no errors.

Any suggestions @Grahame Grieve
